annot: The valid RDF  class(es) for this description; only for RDF data
Expected to be a URI but minimally can just be the name of a metadata element recognized by a community
Assuming a statement can be reused within a set
this needs to be a shex statement, e.g. <= today's date, or a regex?
one or more language tags that are considered valid

valueConstraint: ShEx issue #47 - may be available in the future
annot: only one occurrence of each language tag is allowed
